description:
The Edelrid Beast Crampons are high-end crampons made of high-grade steel for steep ice and mixed climbing. They have a lightweight and robust 3-D design, with forged front teeth that can penetrate hard ice.

  • They also have an interchangeable system that allows you to switch from double to mono point, and an anti-bot plate that prevents snow build-up
  • They can be adjusted from automatic to semi-automatic or soft binding (sold separately), and they have a quick and easy bridge adjustment that fits different boot sizes
  • They come with strap keepers, two additional short front points, and a bag for storage
name: Edelrid Beast Crampons
